title: Can Driver Mode come on without being turned on?
content:
I had connected with my physician via Zoom to start a meeting.  I briefly saw myself and him on the screen, then video went off.  Audio continued, but a line on the screen said video had stopped.  At the very top of the screen a red banner said Driver Mode.  I may not have the exact wording correct as I was trying to talk to my doctor at the time, and as soon as we signed off, the screen messages went away.  

I had Driver Mode turned off and did nothing to turn it on that I know of.  I was sitting in my car at the time but have never paired the car with the phone and have no interest in doing so.

Since I was using the Zoom app, per the doctor's requirement, I can not tell if this is something that app could have done.  I also don't know if the Driver Mode was actually on or was responsible for the turning off of the video.  I only know I didn't access or turn on Driver Mode, nor did I turn video off.  Any ideas?
